name: A Wish Upon a Star (superhiero)
description:
A space-faring adventure of a lonely ship in a lonely solar system. Repair your ship, track down other ships in the system, and discover the wonders that lie dormant in the system. More endings are unlocked as more ships are found and recruited to your merry crew. 

Featuring the voices of Jon and Andrea Coughlin (https://soundcloud.com/clicktozoom)

With music by Joel Whitaker (https://soundcloud.com/joel-whitaker) and Jordan Hartley (https://soundcloud.com/j-desmond-hartley/)

A game for Wizard Jam 7 (https://itch.io/jam/wizard-jam-7)

basic controls:

  • space bar: toggle thrusters
  • mouse: ship direction
  • right-click: interact with objects and other ships
  • R: repair player ship
  • 1, 2, 3: buy the corresponding ship upgrade at space station
  • T: toggle booster speed (once bought)
  • M: toggle map (once bought)
  • A, B, C: make the corresponding wish upon the star
  • Esc: pause game

note: the browser version was very buggy and I've decided to take it down for now.
